QuestData.Title: Sacred Recipe
QuestData.Description: "When the horror comes a-rising$bAnd the heavens hum with war$bOur great vessel of salvation$bMust be broken from its core."$b$bThe scroll continues on for several stanzas. Perhaps somebody at The Sunset Brewgarden will be able to decipher its cryptic message.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Scroll of Auspice to Lya of Ten Songs at The Sunset Brewgarden.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is that some sort of scroll?$b$bWould you mind if I took a look?
QuestData.RewardText: <Lya reads the entirety of the message.>$b$bThis scroll, this... this prophecy...$b$bIt's terrifying!
